hero.title: Join our cause!
hero.description: We help develop social impact projects, organize workshops, hackathons and podcasts. Train other students and schools. And learn from experts and outstanding graduates. Be part of the change today.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Promote digital inclusion through community collaboration by providing technological tools, training, and support to the people and organizations who need it most.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be a benchmark in digital solidarity transformation in Latin America, building bridges between technological knowledge and communities to create lasting social impact.

about.title: What is Ayni Digital?
about.description: We are a group of volunteers committed to [mention mission]. Since [start year], we have been working on projects in [action areas].

founders.title: Our Founders
founders.subtitle: Meet the minds behind our mission to create a positive impact in the community

description.founder: Passionate about technology and social impact. Over 10 years of experience in software development.
description.cofounder: Expert in software architecture and technical leadership. Committed to innovation and sustainable development.
description.director: Specialist in innovation and technological project development. Focused on creating solutions that generate social impact.
description.advisor: Expert in digital strategy and technological transformation. Committed to developing innovative solutions for the social sector.
